author: Bruce Li
title: Lecture 2 first file
question:
(@problem 1)
;; 
;; Write a function that will help eliminate the
;; redundancy in the following expressions:
;; 
(* 3.14 (sqr 3))
(* 3.14 (sqr 6))
(* 3.14 (sqr 2.5))
HI, could someone please give some hints for this question? thans
student_answer: think about what parts are repeated in all of the expressions and which part would be the changing parameter
instructor_answer: We covered this in lecture today.  Try watching the video available through Canvas.
